mapper.insert: INSERT INTO invoices (sender_tax_id, recipient_tax_id, total_price, invoice_number, invoice_series, status, created_at, updated_at, is_active) VALUES (#{senderTaxId}, #{recipientTaxId}, #{totalPrice}, #{invoiceNumber}, #{invoiceSeries}, 'DRAFT', NOW(), NULL, true)
mapper.update: UPDATE invoices SET previous_status = #{previousStatus, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_pending_at = #{lastPendingAt, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, comment = #{comment, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id} AND is_active = true
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM invoices WHERE status = 'PENDING' AND last_pending_at = #{deadline, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND is_active = true
mapper.update: UPDATE invoices SET status = 'APPROVED', updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id} AND is_active = true
mapper.select:
SELECT c.id AS c_id, c.sender_tax_id AS c_sender_tax_id, c.recipient_tax_id AS c_recipient_tax_id, c.total_price AS c_total_price, c.invoice_number AS c_invoice_number, c.is_active AS c_is_active, c.invoice_series AS c_invoice_series, c.status AS c_status, c.previous_status AS previous_status, c.last_pending_at AS last_pending_at, c.comment AS comment, c.created_at AS c_created_at, c.updated_at AS c_updated_at,
i.id AS i_id, i.name AS i_name, i.unit_price AS i_unit_price, i.is_active AS i_is_active, i.quantity AS i_quantity, i.total_price AS i_total_price, i.invoice_id AS i_invoice_id,
o.id AS o_id, o.status AS o_status, o.comment AS o_comment, o.created_at AS o_created_at
FROM invoices c LEFT JOIN items i ON c.id = i.invoice_id AND i.is_active = true LEFT JOIN operations o ON o.item_id = i.id WHERE c.id = #{id} AND c.is_active = true AND c.status IN ('PENDING', 'APPROVED', 'CANCELED', 'CORRECTION', 'DRAFT')
mapper.update: UPDATE invoices SET status = 'DRAFT', is_active = true, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id} AND status IN ('CANCELED')
UPDATE invoices SET recipient_tax_id = #{recipientTaxId}, updated_at = current_timestamp WHERE id = #{invoiceId} AND is_active = true
UPDATE invoices SET status = #{status}, updated_at = current_timestamp WHERE id = #{invoiceId}
